convert_some_image: Convert some image to another format, it is easy!!😍
export_to_format: Export to the format you want
choose_a_image_detail: Choose an image that you want to convert
configure_your_image_detail: Change its height or width if you want
export_detail: Choose the format and wait until it is downloaded
click_me_or_drag: Click me or drag image in me
only_available_image: Only available images with format JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEPG
